CreateAIAnalysisTemplate.document: This example shows you how to create a custom video content analysis template to enable an intelligent categorization task.
CreateAIAnalysisTemplate.title: Creating a template that specifies an analysis task

CreateAIAnalysisTemplate.document: This example shows you how to create a custom video content analysis template to enable intelligent categorization and intelligent tagging tasks.
CreateAIAnalysisTemplate.title: Creating a template that specifies multiple analysis tasks

CreateAIAnalysisTemplate.document: This example shows you how to create a custom video content analysis template to enable all intelligent analysis tasks.
CreateAIAnalysisTemplate.title: Creating a template that enables all content analysis tasks

CreateAIRecognitionTemplate.document: This example shows you how to create a custom video content recognition template and enable a face recognition task. The default face library is used, and the face recognition filter score is 90.
CreateAIRecognitionTemplate.title: Creating a template supporting multiple video content recognition tasks

CreateAIRecognitionTemplate.document: This example shows you how to create a custom video content recognition template and enable a face recognition task. The default face library and custom library are used, and the face recognition filter score is 90.
CreateAIRecognitionTemplate.title: Creating a template that supports multiple recognition tasks and specifies the frame capturing interval

CreateAdaptiveDynamicStreamingTemplate.title: Creating an adaptive bitrate streaming template

CreateAnimatedGraphicsTemplate.title: Creating an animated image generating template

CreateContentReviewTemplate.document: This example shows you how to create a custom intelligent content recognition template to enable only the porn information recognition task, with the following configuration. Threshold scores for rule violation and human recognition: default values; filter tags: not specified.
CreateContentReviewTemplate.title: Creating an intelligent content recognition template to enable only the porn information recognition task

CreateContentReviewTemplate.document: This example shows you how to create a custom intelligent content recognition template to enable a porn information recognition task, with the threshold scores for rule violation and human recognition set to 80 and 30, respectively.
CreateContentReviewTemplate.title: Creating an intelligent content recognition template to enable only the porn information recognition task with specified rule violation threshold and frame capturing interval

CreateContentReviewTemplate.document: This example shows you how to create a custom intelligent content recognition template to enable porn, terrorism, and politically sensitive information recognition tasks with the following configuration. Threshold scores for rule violation and human recognition: default values; filter tags: not specified.
CreateContentReviewTemplate.title: Creating an intelligent content recognition template to enable multiple recognition tasks

CreateContentReviewTemplate.document: This example shows you how to create a custom intelligent content recognition template to enable the porn information recognition task with the following configuration. Threshold values for rule violation and human recognition: default values; filter tags: “porn” and “sexy”.
CreateContentReviewTemplate.title: Creating a content recognition template to enable porn information recognition with specified filter tags

CreateImageSpriteTemplate.title: Creating an image sprite generating template

CreatePersonSample.input:
https://mps.tencentcloudapi.com/?Action=CreatePersonSample
&Name=John Smith
&Tags.0=U.S.
&Tags.1=Celebrity
&Description=American actor, director, and producer
&Usages.0=Recognition.Face
&Usages.1=Review.Face
&FaceContents.
&FaceContents.
&<Common request parameters>
CreatePersonSample.title: Creates image samples

CreateSnapshotByTimeOffsetTemplate.title: Creating a time point screencapturing template

CreateWordSamples.document: If Usages=Review, then this keyword can be used for OCR- and ASR-based recognition of inappropriate content.
CreateWordSamples.title: Creating a keyword sample - `Review`

CreateWordSamples.document: If Usages=["Recognition.Ocr","Review.Ocr"], then this keyword can be used for OCR-based content recognition and inappropriate information detection.
CreateWordSamples.title: Creating a keyword sample - `Recognition`

CreateWordSamples.document: If Usages=All, then this keyword can be used for OCR- and ASR-based content recognition and inappropriate information detection.
CreateWordSamples.title: Creating a keyword sample - `All`

CreateWorkflow.document: This example shows you how to set a transcoding rule named "trans-20-30-40" for the `TopRankVideo-125xxx88` bucket to output in three formats of 20, 30, and 40.
CreateWorkflow.title: Setting a transcoding rule

CreateWorkflow.document: This example shows you how to set a transcoding rule named "snapshot" for the `TopRankVideo-125xxx88` bucket to output in the specification of 10.
CreateWorkflow.title: Setting a sampled screencapturing rule

ModifyAIAnalysisTemplate.document: This example shows you how to modify a custom video content analysis template to enable an intelligent cover generating task.

ModifyAIAnalysisTemplate.document: This example shows you how to modify a custom video content analysis template to disable an intelligent cover generating task.

ModifyAIAnalysisTemplate.document: This example shows you how to modify a custom video content analysis template to enable an intelligent tagging task and disable an intelligent cover generating task.
ModifyAIAnalysisTemplate.title: Enabling a content analysis task and disabling another one at the same time

ModifyContentReviewTemplate.document: This example shows you how to modify a custom intelligent content recognition template as follows: specify no filter tags and change the rule violation and human recognition thresholds for porn information recognition to default values.
ModifyContentReviewTemplate.title: Modifying an intelligent content recognition template to enable a porn information recognition task

ModifyContentReviewTemplate.document: This example shows you how to modify a custom intelligent content recognition template as follows: specify no filter tags and change the rule violation and human recognition threshold scores for porn information recognition to 90 and 60 respectively.
ModifyContentReviewTemplate.title: Modifying an intelligent content recognition template to enable a porn information recognition task with threshold scores specified

ModifyContentReviewTemplate.document: This example shows you how to modify a custom intelligent content recognition template as follows: set the filter tag to “sexy” and change the rule violation and human recognition threshold scores for porn information recognition to 90 and 60 respectively.
ModifyContentReviewTemplate.title: Modifying an intelligent content recognition template to enable a porn information recognition task with filter tags and threshold scores specified

ModifyPersonSample.document: This example shows you how to modify the name and description of an image.
ModifyPersonSample.input:
https://mps.tencentcloudapi.com/?Action=ModifyPersonSample
&PersonId=10569
&Name=John Smith
&Description=American actor, director, and producer
&Usages.0=All
&<Common request parameters>
ModifyPersonSample.title: Modifying image samples

ModifyPersonSample.document: This example shows you how to add a facial feature image and image tag.
ModifyPersonSample.input:
https://mps.tencentcloudapi.com/?Action=ModifyPersonSample
&PersonId=10569
&Name=John Smith
&Description=American actor, director, and producer
&FaceOperationInfo.Type=add
&FaceOperationInfo.FaceContents.
&TagOperationInfo.Type=add
&TagOperationInfo.Tags.0=U.S.
&TagOperationInfo.Tags.1=Celebrity
&<Common request parameters>
ModifyPersonSample.title: Modifying an image sample - `add`

ModifyPersonSample.document: This example shows you how to reset a facial feature image and image tag.
ModifyPersonSample.input:
https://mps.tencentcloudapi.com/?Action=ModifyPersonSample
&PersonId=10569
&Name=John Smith
&Description=American actor, director, and producer
&FaceOperationInfo.Type=reset
&FaceOperationInfo.FaceContents.
&FaceOperationInfo.FaceContents.
&TagOperationInfo.Type=reset
&TagOperationInfo.Tags.0=U.S.
&TagOperationInfo.Tags.1=Celebrity
&<Common request parameters>
ModifyPersonSample.title: Modifying an image sample - `reset`

ModifyPersonSample.document: This example shows you how to delete a facial feature image and image tag.
ModifyPersonSample.input:
https://mps.tencentcloudapi.com/?Action=ModifyPersonSample
&PersonId=10569
&Name=John Smith
&Description=American actor, director, and producer
&FaceOperationInfo.Type=delete
&FaceOperationInfo.FaceIds.0=10026
&TagOperationInfo.Type=delete
&TagOperationInfo.Tags.0=China
&<Common request parameters>
ModifyPersonSample.title: Modifying an image sample - `delete`
